title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8.116 - Executive Order No. 116: Continuing the Declaration of a Disaster in the Counties of Bronx, Kings, Nassau, New York, Orange, Putnam, Queens, Richmond, Rockland, Suffolk, Sullivan, Ulster and Westchester
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8.116 - Executive Order No. 116: Continuing the Declaration of a Disaster in the Counties of Bronx, Kings, Nassau, New York, Orange, Putnam, Queens, Richmond, Rockland, Suffolk, Sullivan, Ulster and Westchester

State Regulations
WHEREAS, on October 26, 2012, I issued Executive Order

Number 47, declaring a disaster emergency in all 62 counties in the State of

New York; and
WHEREAS, on April 24, 2013, I issued Executive Order Number
98 continuing the declaration of a disaster in the counties of Bronx, Kings, Nassau, New York, Orange, Putnam, Queens, Richmond, Rockland, Suffolk, Sullivan, Ulster and Westchester for ninety days; and
WHEREAS, on July 15, 2013, I issued Executive Order Number
109 continuing the declaration of a disaster in the counties of Bronx, Kings, Nassau, New York, Orange, Putnam, Queens, Richmond, Rockland, Suffolk, Sullivan, Ulster and Westchester for ninety days; and
WHEREAS, beginning on October 29, 2012 and for a period
continuing thereafter, Superstorm Sandy brought damaging winds and torrential
rainfall causing record flooding and severe storm surge throughout the State of

New York, damage from which certain areas of the State are still working to
recover; NOW, THEREFORE, I, ANDREW M. CUOMO, Governor of the State
of New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by Section 29-a of Article
2-B of the Executive Law, and after having reconsidered all of the relevant
facts and circumstances, do hereby order the declaration of a disaster, as
ordered by Executive Order Number 47 and continued by Executive Order Numbers
98 and 109, shall be continued for the counties of Bronx, Kings, Nassau, New

York, Orange, Putnam, Queens, Richmond, Rockland, Suffolk, Sullivan, Ulster and

Westchester for one hundred and twenty days. Signed: Andrew M. Cuomo

Dated: October 11, 2013

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8.116

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
